description:
Experience the freedom of accessing clean, virus-free water wherever your adventures lead. This rugged 8L powerhouse seamlessly combines efficiency with reliability, ensuring clean and safe drinking water for your journeys. Whether they're in the wild or in unexpected emergencies, ensure you're always prepared.

  • 8L dromedary is ultra-durable and collapsible
  • The Ultrafilter Membrane provides comprehensive Virus, Bacteria, and Parasite Protection. Safeguarding against viruses like Rotavirus and Hepatitis A, bacteria such as E.coli and Salmonella, parasites like Giardia and Cryptosporidium, along with microplastics, sand, dirt, and cloudiness
  • 30L/hr flow rate through gravity alone, this system eliminates the need for pumping or external power sources, emphasizing convenience
  • Ultrafilter membrane boasts an impressive lifetime capacity of 18,000 liters, equivalent to five years of safe drinking water for a family of five, ensuring long-term reliability
  • Webbing handle including a carabiner for hanging and carrying
  • 1.2m quick connect hose is compatible with other systems
  • Included backwash syringe for cleaning filter
  • Operating solely on gravity, this system eliminates the need for pumping, batteries, or external power sources, offering simplicity at its finest
  • LifeStraw’s Follow the Liters program provides a child in a developing country safe with drinking water for an entire school year with every LifeStraw product sold
name: LifeStraw Peak Series Gravity Water Purifier System, 8L
